content:
### Bug fixes **core**: Luxon now applies the correct timezone. Refer to [Luxon](/code/cookbook/luxon.md) for more information.
**core**: fixed an issue with localization that was preventing i18n files from loading.
[Action Network Node:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.actionnetwork.md) Fix a pagination issue and add credentials test.
